title: Topic 003 Question 036
body: You have an Azure subscription that is linked to a tenant in Microsoft Azure Active Directory (Azure AD), part of Microsoft Entra. The tenant that contains a security group named Group1. The subscription contains an Azure Data Lake Storage account named myaccount1. The myaccount1 account contains two containers named container1 and container2.
You need to grant Group1 read access to container1. The solution must use the principle of least privilege.
Which role should you assign to Group1?
options: Storage Table Data Reader for myaccount1
Storage Blob Data Reader for container1
Storage Blob Data Reader for myaccount1
Storage Table Data Reader for container1
